description:
Zeno demands to meet with Goku and asks him for something very odd. Meanwhile in the 10th Universe, Zamasu’s hatred for humans grows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to See Son Goku: Zen-Oh Sama`s Summoning!
Ich will Goku treffen, ne? – Eine Audienz bei König Zen-Oh!
Son Gokuu ni Aitai no ne: Zen`ou-sama kara no Yobidashi!
孫悟空に会いたいのね 全王様からのよびだし!
